reviewText: One of the best films ever made - excellent indie film and great story.  I highly recommend a copy for your library.
I really enjoyed this movie and its portrayal of an Armenian family living in Los Angeles.  The music was especially moving.

This movie represents exactly how all movies should be made- real and with a good point to it. This movie does not hide behind extreme graphics or crazy effects- its greatness lies in the story and the realness of the characters. They are portrayed extremely well and everyone can relate to atleast one of them. These are the qualities that make a good movie, so if you are looking for something different you should definitely check it out!

I absolutely loved this film.  It is a wonderful story that is written in such a touching way.  It's funny, action packed and very heartfelt.  It brought me into the Armenian community and I fell in love with each and every character. I would definitely recommend that everyone see this movie and share it with your loved ones.  Two thumbs way up!!
One of the most entertaining films i've seen in a long time. It's the kind of movie that after you see it, you want to tell everyone you know to check it out. Hands down, the best movie of 2004.
